title: Get Woke, Go Mentally Broke (Ep 1322)
description:
In this episode, I address the stunning announcement by the Harris-Biden ticket yesterday. I also discuss the worst incident of media bias I’ve seen in a long time. Finally, I address “woke” culture and the backwards logic behind it. 

News Picks:


Three key concepts that the woke “anti-racists” believe in. 


Poll: Most voters want a crackdown on violent protests, except Democrats. 

President Trump announces a historic deal between Israel and the UAE.

Should President Trump be in line for the Nobel Peace Prize?
